articles.author: Ciara Farmer
articles.title: Elton John, 74, POSTPONES his farewell tour for two years after a fall - Daily Mail
articles.description: The statement read: 'It is with great sadness and a heavy heart that I am forced to reschedule the 2021 dates of my Farewell Yellow Brick Road tour in Europe and the UK to 2023'
articles.content:
Elton John has postponed his Farewell Yellow Brick Road tour in Europe and the UK to 2023, as he awaits surgery following 'an awkward fall'.

articles.title: Europe's low-cost airlines could have the edge in a post-Covid world - CNBC
articles.description: It's been a bruising time for airlines as the coronavirus pandemic brought travel to a halt. But now, low-cost carriers seem to be showing signs of recovery.
articles.content:
